subsection_analysis.refined_text: Sometimes form creators don’t convert their PDFs to interactive fillable forms Or, they intentionally design a form that you can fill in only by hand or with the Fill & Sign tool Fill in interactive forms An interactive form contains fields that you can select or fill in

Is the form fillable Not all forms are fillable Sometimes form creators don’t convert their PDFs to interactive fillable forms Or, they intentionally design a form that you can fill in only by hand or with the Fill & Sign tool These non-interactive forms are called flat forms Fill in interactive forms An interactive form contains fields that you can select or fill in

In the real estate industry, sharing documents efficiently is crucial for closing deals and keeping clients informed Here's a tailored checklist to help you manage your PDF sharing needs
